title: ‘We Were Racing on Fumes 15 Years Ago’: Thomas De Gendt Says Nutrition is Biggest Change as He Nears Career Farewell
content:
Time running out for Thomas De Gendt and his final breakaway win at Vuelta a España: 'The legs have to cooperate too.'

Read the full article at ‘We Were Racing on Fumes 15 Years Ago’: Thomas De Gendt Says Nutrition is Biggest Change as He Nears Career Farewell on Velo.
author: ahood
